|--------|----------|-----------|-------|--------|
| Rectus Capitis Anterior | C1 (lateral mass) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | C1 Ant ramus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Bilaterally flexes AOJ; Unilaterally I/L SB |

: Longus capitis OIAN {.striped .hover}

## Origin
C1 (lateral mass) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
C1 Ant ramus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: flex AO Joint
- **Unilateral**: Lateral Flexion of AO joint

# Muscle groups
Rectus capitis anterior is part of the [prevertebral muscle group]({{< var ref-oians >}})
